description: JetRails provides fully-managed Magento 1 hosting on dedicated servers and single-tenant public cloud accounts. Security services include firewalling, malware scanning, and intrusion detection solutions. By leveraging partnerships with teams such as Cloudflare, Sansec, and Sucuri, JetRails provides best-in-class security for Magento 1 stores.
